thread.title: John Hancock

author: John Hancock
title: John Hancock
text: Well firstly they have great communication with customers queries. I was in need of a new front brake and i questioned them via facebook regarding the Magura MT5. They responded very quickly, answering my questions. I then went ahead and proceeded with the purchase. They had the cheapest price and best reviews from all the shops i had looked at. This was my first ever buy from Mantel, but won't be the last. I look forward to buying my rear brake soon from them :) oh, and shipping was only 2 days! :D
